s0135: Wei Zhong died, son Song Gong Ji established.
s0136: Song Gong Ji died, son Ding Gong Shen established.
s0137: Ding Gong Shen died, son Min Gong Gong established.
s0138: Min Gong Gong died, younger brother Yang Gong Xi established.
s0139: Yang Gong ascended position, Min Gong son Fu Si assassinated Yang Gong self established, said 'I should establish', this was Li Gong.
s0140: Li Gong died, son Xi Gong Ju established.
s0141: Xi Gong seventeenth year, Zhou Li Wang exited fled Zhi.
s0142: Twenty-eighth year, Xi Gong died, son Hui Gong Xi established.
s0143: Hui Gong fourth year, Zhou Xuan Wang ascended position.
s0144: Thirtieth year, Hui Gong died, son Ai Gong established.
s0145: Ai Gong first year died, son Dai Gong established.
s0146: Dai Gong twenty-ninth year, Zhou You Wang for Quan Rong killed, Qin began ranked as feudal lords.
s0147: Thirty-fourth year, Dai Gong died, son Wu Gong Si Kong established.
s0148: Wu Gong gave birth daughter became Lu Hui Gong wife, gave birth Lu Huan Gong.
s0149: Eighteenth year, Wu Gong died, son Xuan Gong Li established.
s0150: Xuan Gong had crown prince Yu Yi.
s0151: Nineteenth year, Xuan Gong ill, yielded his younger brother He, said: 'Father die son succeed, elder brother die younger brother reach, world universal righteousness.
s0153: He also three yielded received it.
s0154: Xuan Gong died, younger brother He established, this was Mu Gong.
s0155: Mu Gong ninth year, ill, summoned grand commander Kong Fu said: 'Previous lord Xuan Gong abandoned crown prince Yu Yi established me, I not dare forget.
s0156: I die, must establish Yu Yi.'
s0157: Kong Fu said: 'Group ministers all wish establish gong zi Feng.'
s0158: Mu Gong said: 'Do not establish Feng, I cannot betray Xuan Gong.'
s0159: Then Mu Gong sent Feng exit reside at Zheng.
s0160: Eighth month Geng Chen, Mu Gong died, elder brother Xuan Gong son Yu Yi established, this was Shang Gong.
s0161: Jun Zi heard it, said: 'Song Xuan Gong can call know person, established his younger brother to complete righteousness, but finally his son again enjoyed it.
s0162: Shang Gong first year, Wei gong zi Zhou Xu assassinated his lord Wan self established, wished obtain feudal lords, sent inform Song said: 'Feng in Zheng, must make disorder, can with me attack him.'
s0163: Song permitted it, with attacked Zheng, to Dong Men returned.
s0164: Second year, Zheng attacked Song, to repay Dong Men campaign.
s0165: Its after feudal lords several came invade attack.
s0166: Ninth year, grand commander Kong Fu Jia wife good, exited, road encountered grand steward Hua Du, Du pleased, gazed observed her.
s0167: Du coveted Kong Fu wife, then sent people declare in country said: 'Shang Gong ascended position ten years, but eleven battles, people bitter cannot bear, all Kong Fu did it, I will kill Kong Fu to pacify people.'
s0168: This year, Lu assassinated its lord Yin Gong.
s0169: Tenth year, Hua Du attacked killed Kong Fu, took his wife.
s0170: Shang Gong angered, then assassinated Shang Gong, welcomed Mu Gong son Feng from Zheng established him, this was Zhuang Gong.
s0171: Zhuang Gong first year, Hua Du as chancellor.
s0172: Ninth year, seized Zheng's Ji Zhong, coerced with establish Tu as Zheng lord.
s0173: Ji Zhong permitted, finally established Tu.
s0174: Nineteenth year, Zhuang Gong died, son Min Gong Jie established.
s0175: Min Gong seventh year, Qi Huan Gong ascended position.
s0176: Ninth year, Song flood, Lu sent Cang Wen Zhong go console flood.
s0177: Min Gong self blamed said: 'I with cannot serve ghosts spirits, government not cultivate, so flood.'
s0178: Cang Wen Zhong praised this words.
s0179: This words then gong zi Zi Yu taught Min Gong.
s0180: Tenth year summer, Song attacked Lu, battled at Cheng Qiu, Lu alive captured Song Nan Gong Wan.
s0181: Song people requested Wan, Wan returned Song.
s0182: Eleventh year autumn, Min Gong with Nan Gong Wan hunted, because gambling contended road, Min Gong angered, humiliated him, said: 'Initially I respected you;
s0184: 南宮萬怒，殺宋閔公于蒙澤。
s0185: 大司馬龔固曰：「吾聞禍與福鄰，莫知其得。
s0186: 失不可不慎，今兹我國有大事，子有權矣。
s0187: 不可以輕，盍歸亶甲以卜？」
s0189: 公子卬至，入弒其兄悼公而自立，是為桓公。
s0190: 桓公二年，諸侯伐宋，至郊而去。
s0191: 三年，齊桓公見諸侯于嬴，立宋桓公。
s0192: 桓公病，太子兹甫讓其弟而自立。
s0194: 桓公病甚，兹甫請曰：「必欲立太子，則已立之。
s0196: 桓公卒，太子兹甫立，是為襄公。
s0198: 十年，宋伐魯，戰于乘丘，取僑丘。
s0199: 二十年，襄公卒，子成公王臣立。
s0200: 成公二年，執鄭祭仲，歸之于齊，祭仲言于齊人，矯以天子之命以責賄于鄭。
s0201: 鄭悼公之時，執宋司馬華元，歸之于鄭。
s0202: 二十三年，成公卒，子昭公杵臼立。
s0205: 佐惡而婉，昭公母常愛魏姬，欲以為夫人，使魏姬賊昭公，而以佐為太子。
s0207: 文公元年，楚太子商臣弒其父成王代立。
s0208: 三年，文公名佐，改曰鮑牛。
s0211: 九年，文公卒，子共公瑕立。
s0213: 十六年，共公卒，子平公成立。
s0214: 平公三年，楚使魯申叔時聘于宋。
s0217: 十八年，平公卒，子元公佐立。
s0218: 元公三年，楚公子弃疾弒其君靈王而自立。
s0221: 元公饑，食楚司馬子西之粟，曰：「誰謂宋遠？
s0224: 二十七年，元公卒，子景公頭曼立。
s0225: 景公二十五年，晉大夫智伯滅范、中行氏。
s0226: 二十七年，景公卒，子公孫周立。
s0227: 公孫周卒，子悼公購由立。
s0228: 悼公元年，晉滅智伯，分其地。
s0230: 十二年，悼公卒，子剔成立。
s0231: 剔成四十一年，剔成弟偃攻襲剔成，剔成敗奔齊，偃自立為宋君。
s0235: 西敗魏軍，乃與齊、魏為敵國。
s0236: 盛血以韋囊，縣而射之，命曰「射天」。
s0238: 君偃二十五年，十一月，剔成弟偃弒剔成于雍丘，立剔成之子肥。
s0240: 二十六年，齊魏伐宋，執宋君偃。
s0241: 宋立剔成之子肥，是為康王。
s0242: 康王即位三十七年，家有祟，夜鬼擊之，康王不知，遂射鬼。
s0243: 時有好鬼祟者為之言曰：「王實無好，百姓惡也。
s0245: 其後康王為無道，為諸侯所討伐。
s0246: 秦始皇二十二年，秦滅魏，二十四年，秦兵遂滅宋，而天下壹并于秦。
s0247: 太史公曰：孔子稱「微子去之，箕子為之奴，比干諫而死，殷有三仁焉」。
s0248: 夏桀之時，微子開辟，遭纣之世，君有辱民，臣有辱身。
s0249: 或干王誅，或隨而死，或佯狂而去。
s0251: 宋襄公之時，諸侯以力相爭，宋獨為仁義，弱而見取。
s0252: 此以宋襄之賢而不能自立也。
